title: ‘Can You Imagine if We Achieve This Record in Our Jersey?’ Alexander Vinokurov on Mark Cavendish’s Tour Chances
content:
Astana Qazaqstan team supremo keeps the faith in Cavendish’s prospects of making Tour de France history.

Read the full article at ‘Can You Imagine if We Achieve This Record in Our Jersey?’ Alexander Vinokurov on Mark Cavendish’s Tour Chances on Velo.
author: sstokes
